title: HOUR 2 - Rick Spielman, Kenny Pickett
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Rick Spielman, Kenny Pickett
description:
Rick Spielman joins the show to give his opinion on the future of Jordan Love in Green bay, how the Pittsburgh Steelers are going to go about managing the pressure of fans wanting Kenny Pickett week 1 and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
